welcome_message_body: Welcome to Commack, USA! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy our city's unique charm and all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Southwest Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal exclusively serves Southwest Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, gift shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying in on private jets, the airport offers a separate terminal with luxurious lounges and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport is home to all major airlines and offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport is reserved for private and corporate aircraft and offers exclusive services and amenities for its passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to get online.
